name: airbnb-style
description: A mostly reasonable approach to JavaScript.

scripts.postinstall: npm run install:config && npm run install:config:base && rm -rf node_modules/markdownlint-cli/node_modules/markdownlint
scripts.install:config: if [ -d packages/eslint-config-airbnb ]; then cd packages/eslint-config-airbnb && npm install; elif [ -d package/packages/eslint-config-airbnb ]; then cd package/packages/eslint-config-airbnb && npm install; else echo 'config skipped'; fi
scripts.install:config:base: if [ -d packages/eslint-config-airbnb-base ]; then cd packages/eslint-config-airbnb-base && npm install; elif [ -d package/packages/eslint-config-airbnb-base ]; then cd package/packages/eslint-config-airbnb-base && npm install; else echo 'config:base skipped'; fi
scripts.test: npm run --silent test:config && npm run --silent test:config:base
scripts.travis: npm run --silent travis:config && npm run --silent travis:config:base

author: Harrison Shoff <hi@hshoff.com> (https://twitter.com/hshoff)
